topics.title: Who is Houyi?
topics.prompt: Who is Houyi in the legend?
topics.sample: Houyi was a great archer who saved the world by shooting down nine suns.

topics.title: Ten Suns
topics.prompt: Why did Houyi shoot down the suns?
topics.sample: He shot down the suns because the heat was burning the earth and killing people and crops.

topics.title: After the Shot
topics.prompt: What happened after Houyi shot the suns?
topics.sample: After he shot down nine suns, only one was left to give light and warmth to the world.

topics.title: Character Traits
topics.prompt: What qualities does Houyi show? Give examples.
topics.sample: Houyi was brave and responsible because he risked his life to save others.

topics.title: Dialogue
topics.prompt: Make a short dialogue between Houyi and the villagers.
topics.sample: Villager: Thank you, Houyi! You saved us! Houyi: I only did what was right for the people.

topics.title: Cause & Effect
topics.prompt: Explain the cause and effect in the story of Houyi.
topics.sample: Because there were too many suns, Houyi used his bow to shoot them down, saving the earth.

topics.title: Setting
topics.prompt: Describe the world when ten suns were in the sky.
topics.sample: The world was extremely hot, rivers dried up, and people could hardly survive.

topics.title: Moral
topics.prompt: What is a possible lesson from the legend?
topics.sample: The story teaches us the importance of courage and balance in life.

topics.title: Compare Heroes
topics.prompt: Compare Houyi with another hero you know.
topics.sample: Houyi is similar to Hercules because both are strong heroes who protect others.

topics.title: Retell
topics.prompt: Retell the story in 5 sentences using your own words.
topics.sample: Long ago, ten suns appeared. Houyi shot down nine. The world cooled. People lived happily again. He became a hero.
